page.title: 06Highbrook - Recreation
page.content: In an area marked by a number of large affluent households many horses are kept and riding is popular. There are several private swimming pools and tennis courts. Residents wishing to play football, cricket, badminton and tennis can do so in nearby villages. The nearest towns, East Grinstead and Haywards Heath are well provided with public sports facilities and leisure centres as well as first class rugby,tennis,hockey, cricket and squash clubs. Archery is practised at Highbrook and angling in the Horsted lakes.The many well sign-posted footpaths maintained by local parish councils make walking a popular pastime and the local scenery also attracts visitors to the area.
